task.summary: Default task
Removed all references to log4j in comments from poms since dependabot was still flagging them.
Mostly audit of QDL utilities that access stores. Added scopes returned in 7591 (client management) registration since oidc-agent expects these.
Updated docs and website. Improved test scripts for CIL-1159
5.2.4 checkin
Removed GPG signing, updated help
Small updates to documentation, updates to constructors for new module stack classes.
Updated tests to test new key support for CIL-1193. Updated QDL modules to support new XML serialization.
CIL-1187 support -- more and better errors from the DBService endpoing.

CIL-1146 support. First cut is standard authorization. Had to move some classes around too.
Removed oa4mp-gui package since that was causing dependabot alerts. It was me tinkering with a more usable CLI interface, but that was going to be vastly more trouble than it would be worth.
CIL-1146. This required some small changes but mostly this was making sure the maven build would work.
Updated documentation. Fixed TXRecord serialization issue.
CIL-771. Test cleanup.
CIL-771. Updated changelog and improved documentation.
Merge from 5.2.5. CIL-1225.
CIL-1174. Use default Java trust manager as the default. Updated a testing readme.
Support for SciAuth
Improved debugging, making it more modular. Lots of updates to scripts and testing.
CIL-1206. Updated CLI documentation.
Added ability to check if a transaction should be garbage collected in the CLI.

Added database lock during garbage collection. Added CLI ability to do GC management, so can lock/unlock database, check number of pending, and do the actual garbage collection from the command line now.
Fix for CIL-1267. Improvements to exception handling so errors from LDAP don't result in an ugly and cryptic message to users. New JLab scripts. Internal changes to QDL state propagated to OA2State.
Fix for CIL-1267. CIL-1268. Mostly boils down to don't save too early in the exchange/refresh.
CIL-1268. Added tracking original state so certain errors can be backed out of generally across all components. No internal server errors, e.g., should ever invalidated tokens.
Found and fixed edge case for converter. minor tweak to token servlet for rollback from proxy error.
Server QDL scripts supported as well as multiple QDL configurations in the server config.

Realized that some of the state management for scripting was very antiquated and was causing tons of redundant saves to the database. Cleaned that out. Handlers now work on the same transaction (as they should) rather than marshalling and unmarshalling it for every operation.
in light of the recent security even with Custos, I added a function to the CLI to create passwords more easily. It's a good addition.
Changed some signatures and names in QDL which percolated through OA4MP.

Changed some signatures and names in QDL which percolated through OA4MP. CIL-1286 fix. Mail dependencies were somehow converted from "provided" to being included. This cause the famous ClassCastException https://github.com/ncsa/security-lib/blob/728bf79c7ee5605d6f6e5a3586b3f4ff3267967b/ncsa-security-common/ncsa-security-servlet/src/main/java/edu/uiuc/ncsa/security/servlet/mail/ServletMailUtil.java#L55 in Tomcat.
Configuration for FNAL.
Pre-travel checkin. Updated QDL scripts. 𝕰𝖗s𝖆𝖙𝖟 client support.
CIL-1313, CIL-1312, CIL-1310 Tweaked logging messages to make them clearer.
Added a lot of documentation. Some clean up related to that.
Class rename part 2.
pre-trave checkin
Updated documentation, some scripts and fixed CIL-1348
Migrate to Java 11, restructure maven modules, remove OAuth 1.0a code from build.
CIL-627: Build is now done with Java 17 targeting Java 11 output. This allows for completely updating all Maven plugins. CIL-1349, QDL scripts for ACCESS.
Update driver versions.
Updated maven plugins.
CIL-627 massive update. Not quite functional for build, but very large so will commit now
CIL-627 massive, dreaded update part II, where literally every file had to be touched. Oy veh! Builds now.
CIL-627 part III. Refactoring of security-all causes ripples.

MESSAGE.value: Added database lock during garbage collection. Added CLI ability to do GC management, so can lock/unlock database, check number of pending, and do the actual garbage collection from the command line now.
Fix for CIL-1267. Improvements to exception handling so errors from LDAP don't result in an ugly and cryptic message to users. New JLab scripts. Internal changes to QDL state propagated to OA2State.
Fix for CIL-1267. CIL-1268. Mostly boils down to don't save too early in the exchange/refresh.
CIL-1268. Added tracking original state so certain errors can be backed out of generally across all components. No internal server errors, e.g., should ever invalidated tokens.
Found and fixed edge case for converter. minor tweak to token servlet for rollback from proxy error.
Server QDL scripts supported as well as multiple QDL configurations in the server config.

Realized that some of the state management for scripting was very antiquated and was causing tons of redundant saves to the database. Cleaned that out. Handlers now work on the same transaction (as they should) rather than marshalling and unmarshalling it for every operation.
in light of the recent security even with Custos, I added a function to the CLI to create passwords more easily. It's a good addition.
Changed some signatures and names in QDL which percolated through OA4MP.

Changed some signatures and names in QDL which percolated through OA4MP. CIL-1286 fix. Mail dependencies were somehow converted from "provided" to being included. This cause the famous ClassCastException https://github.com/ncsa/security-lib/blob/728bf79c7ee5605d6f6e5a3586b3f4ff3267967b/ncsa-security-common/ncsa-security-servlet/src/main/java/edu/uiuc/ncsa/security/servlet/mail/ServletMailUtil.java#L55 in Tomcat.
Configuration for FNAL.
Pre-travel checkin. Updated QDL scripts. s client support.
CIL-1313, CIL-1312, CIL-1310 Tweaked logging messages to make them clearer.
Added a lot of documentation. Some clean up related to that.
Class rename part 2.
pre-trave checkin
Updated documentation, some scripts and fixed CIL-1348
Migrate to Java 11, restructure maven modules, remove OAuth 1.0a code from build.
CIL-627: Build is now done with Java 17 targeting Java 11 output. This allows for completely updating all Maven plugins. CIL-1349, QDL scripts for ACCESS.
Update driver versions.
Updated maven plugins.
CIL-627 massive update. Not quite functional for build, but very large so will commit now
CIL-627 massive, dreaded update part II, where literally every file had to be touched. Oy veh! Builds now.
CIL-627 part III. Refactoring of security-all causes ripples.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: CIL-627 part III. Refactoring of security-all causes ripples.
